rendering a document with floating table of contents:
output:
  html_document:
    toc: true
    toc_float: true

rendering to multiple outputs:
output:
  html_document:
    toc: true
    toc_float: true
  pdf_document: default
  
we can turn off the default display using
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)

for html_documents, using click to see the code:
output:
  html_document:
    code_folding: hide
    
use at the same time, html and git as output
output:
  html_notebook: default
  github_document: default
  
For presentations, the first # means first(beginning)  of slide, and ## level header. Also using *** means new slide without header.

flexdashboard is a great way to create dashboards:
"#" begins a new page
"##" new column
"###" new row
